items.summary: Update the Contact page so the entire Contact Information section (including its headings and the Email/Location/WhatsApp values/links) renders in white text, while keeping the Contact page header ("Get In Touch" + subtitle) unchanged.

Update the Contact form UI so the form area uses black text (including the form title/description, labels, and user-entered input/textarea text) because the form background is white/light, while preserving existing validation and submit-success/error messaging behavior.
